name: Dialect Recognition and ASR
description: Evaluates speech recognition accuracy across regional dialects and ability to identify dialect type.

metrics.name: cer_per_dialect
metrics.definition: Character Error Rate for each dialect

metrics.name: cross_dialect_robustness
metrics.definition: ASR performance degradation on non-standard dialects

test_method: Evaluate ASR and dialect identification across major Chinese dialects (Cantonese, Sichuanese, Min, Wu, etc.) and other language dialects.
notes: Dialect ASR is challenging due to phonological, lexical, and grammatical differences. Chinese dialects are particularly diverse and mutually unintelligible.
